description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Manage daily administration and support services delivered to business operations in accordance to agreed service level standards including: office management including front-desk management, meetings organizing, travelling support, cleaning & house-keeping, and other aspects of office’s requirements
              
              •        Develop continuous improvement plans or initiatives to new/existing administration and support service processes delivered to operations
              
              •        Monitor operational mechanisms to evaluate implementation effectiveness of administration and support services
              
              •        Manage and build collaboration with internal departments to resolve issues affecting administration and support services delivered
              
              •        Manage overall maintenance and cleanliness of office premises, equipment upkeep schedule and asset control to provide safe/efficient working environment for employees
              
              •        Manage and resolve department/employee complaints and requests
              
              •        Monitor to ensure 3rd parties service quality including cleaning & housekeeping, catering, photocopier rental and car rental.
              
              •        Budget preparation and monitoring for admin and related.
              
              •        Organize year-end party, conference for managers and staff…
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, or an equivalent degree
              
              •        Minimum 3 to 5 years’ experience in a similar role
              
              •        Minimum two to 2 years’ experience in a managerial capacity
              
              •       SAP familiarity is a plus
              
              •        Demonstrate advanced knowledge of principles and techniques of administrative management (e.g. lean 6-sigma best practices, etc.)
              
              •        Demonstrate advanced analytical skills and attention to detail
              
              •        Demonstrate advanced experience in analyzing complex data, understanding of business implications, and making recommendations to management team
              
              •        Demonstrate proficiency in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)
              
              •        Demonstrate fluency in English, both written and spoken
              
              •        People interaction
              
              •        Communication skill
              
              •        Problem solving skill
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
